text: Hello! I'm a developer making templates for my org in HubSpot and I just started recently (about a week ago). I'm making some drag-and-drop templates via HTML and HubL, and based on my understanding of the language and the documentation I'm not seeing what I expect in the published template.
So I'm expecting a dnd area with two columns, about 50% page width each, and appearing side-by-side
So I figured out what was wrong!
My code was missing {% dnd_row %} wraps around each {% dnd_module %}
Also I was missing this CSS file
